original_text: But after the three and a half days the breath of life from God entered them, and they stood on their feet, and terror struck those who saw them.
korean_text: 삼 일 반 후에 하나님께로부터 생기가 그들 속에 들어가매 그들이 발로 일어서니 구경하는 자들이 크게 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: But after three and a half days
breath of life from God entered them
and they stood on their feet
and terror struck those who saw them
